mapper.select: SELECT student_number, NAME, sum( CASE WHEN sign_state = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS sign, sum( CASE WHEN sign_state = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS sick_leave, sum( CASE WHEN sign_state = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS absence FROM student_sign INNER JOIN student ON student.id = student_sign.student_id WHERE student_id IN ( SELECT student_id FROM class_student WHERE class_id =#{classId} ) AND course_sign_id IN ( SELECT id FROM course_sign WHERE teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND course_id = #{courseId} ) GROUP BY student_number
